SpcimenView.name: SpcimenView
SpcimenView.description:
This class holds the three orthogonal views from a single specimen and 
allows for loading in of differnt specimens of the same genenotype/colonyID

params.name: VolumePaths
params.description: volumes paths for a specific mutant/baseline

params.name: id
params.description: unique id for this view

params.name: container
params.description: html element to place this view

params.name: queryColonyId
params.description: The colonyId of this specimen

params.name: indexCallBack
params.description: called when slice index changes

classitems.description: Retrieves data using asynchronous HTTP request.

params.name: url
params.description: Resource URL to retrieve data from.

params.name: handler
params.description: Handles successful retrieval.

classitems.description: Create event handler for controlling the specimen view
classitems.name: createEventHandlers

classitems.description:
Creates the html needed for the specimen view to live in.
Uses handlebar.js to generate from templates
classitems.name: createHtml

params.name: orient
params.description: Orientation (X, Y or Z)

classitems.description:
Get Jquery handles on elements that need to be accessed multiple times
Should speed things up not having to query the DOM all the time
classitems.name: jQuerySelectors

classitems.description:
Use handlebars.js to the controls tab HTML for the specimen view
Controls tab contains zoom buttons contrst slider etc.
classitems.name: controls_tab

classitems.description:
Replace current specimen volume with another.
Destroys current object (not sure is necessary) add new path and call setupoRenderers
classitems.name: replaceVolume

params.name: VolumePath
params.description: path to new volume to load into viewer

classitems.description: Call the XTK functions that are required to get our volume rendered in 2D
classitems.name: setupRenderers

classitems.description: Responds to invert color checkbox, and inverts the lookup table
classitems.name: invertColour

params.name: checked
params.description: Is the checkbox active

classitems.description: Called when the slice index is changed either from the slider of the mouse scroll button
classitems.name: sliceChange

params.name: id
params.description: The ID of the this SpecimenView class

params.name: ortho
params.description: The orthogonal view that was changed ('X', 'Y', or 'Z')

classitems.description:
Update the slice index or contrast sliders.
If the shift key is down, we want to move the other orthogonal views index correspondingly
If the left mouse button is down, we are changing the contrast, so update the contrast sliders
classitems.name: updateSliders

params.name: renderer
params.description: The renderer from which the event came from. Contains the event

params.name: name
params.description: description

classitems.description:
Gets executed after all files were fully loaded and just before the first rendering attempt.
Sets up: Volumes and their index to view, index sliders, and mouse whell events
classitems.name: xtk_showtime

classitems.description:
Set the volume index for the X orientation
Apply the offset used in linking orthogonal views across SpecimenViews
classitems.name: setIndex

params.name: index
params.description: The new slice index to set

classitems.description:
Set the volume index for the Y orientation
Apply the offset used in linking orthogonal views across SpecimenViews
classitems.name: setIndex

params.name: index
params.description: The new slice index to set

classitems.description:
Set the volume index for the Z orientation
Apply the offset used in linking orthogonal views across SpecimenViews
classitems.name: setIndex

params.name: index
params.description: The new slice index to set

classitems.description: Get the index of the current slice for a orthogonal view
classitems.name: getIndex

params.name: ortho
params.description: Orthogonal view ('x', 'Y' or 'Z')

classitems.description:
Set the index offset for a specific orthogonal view.
The offset defines how much the slice index differs compared to the corresponding slice in the
other view

Set which orthogonal views should be visible. Change the container width
to take up the full width of the outer container.
If orientation in vertical, slice width should always be 100%
classitems.name: setVisibleViews

params.name: viewsList
params.description: Info on which orthogonal view is visible

params.name: count
params.description: How many views should be visible

classitems.description: Extract the basename from a path
classitems.name: basename

params.name: path
params.description: File path
